Radiator
Radiator Size: 396mm x 120mm x 30mm

Other Specification
Specification: CPU Socket Compatability: Intel 1700 | Intel 1200 | AMD AM4Compatible Materials: Only mix with other copper / brass productsCompatible Coolants: CORSAIR XL or equivalentPort Thread: G1/4" BSPPPump Type: Xylem D5 PWMFan Quantity: 3Max Operating Temperature: 60°C coolant temperatureThermal Material: Pre-applied thermal pasteRequired Controller For iCUE Support: CORSAIR Commander pro / Commander Core XT / Lighting Node PRO


Features
Features: Make Your PC a Visual Masterpiece: A complete Hydro X Series RGB PRO hardline custom cooling kit gives your system a stunning, distinctive look using only premium components.CPU Custom Cooling in One Box: Includes all the parts you need, along with tube bending tools and extra fittings for GPU cooling expansion (GPU block not included).Push Your System Further: Enjoy superior CPU cooling performance and remarkably quiet operation, powered by an intelligently controlled D5 custom cooling pump with an included temperature sensor for automatic cooling adjustments based on your system's current needs.Easy Installation: Get up and running quickly, with the option for automated control to set your fan and pump speeds to their lowest possible noise level.Dynamic RGB Lighting: Individually addressable RGB LEDs integrated into the CPU water block, pump/reservoir, and cooling fans give your PC a striking look to stand out from the crowd.XC7 RGB PRO CPU Water Block: Combines premium construction and extreme cooling performance, compatible with Intel LGA 1700, LGA 1200 and AMD AM4 sockets.XD5 RGB Pump/Reservoir Combo: Features a high-performance D5 PWM pump, integrated RGB lighting, and in-loop temperature sensor.XR5 360mm Performance Radiator: Delivers outstanding heat dissipation with a 30mm radiator thickness and premium copper core.Three iCUE QL120 RGB PWM Fans: 34 RGB LEDs split across four distinct light loops create vibrant lighting and visual effects to go along with powerful cooling.Complete Software Control: An iCUE controller and powerful CORSAIR iCUE software let you adjust fan and pump settings, monitor temperatures, customize RGB lighting, and synchronize it with all iCUE-compatible products in your setup.XT Hardline Tubing: Create stunning loops, easily cut and bent to your needs using the included saw, bending mandrel, tube holder, and silicone insert, and installed with the included XF Hardline Fittings and Adapters.


Package Contents: 
1 x XC7 RGB PRO CPU Block
1 x XD5 Pump reservoir combo
1 x XR5 360mm Radiator
1 x XL8 Clear coolant *1l bottle
3 x QL120 RGB fans (3x single retail box)
1 x CORSAIR RGB Fan LED Hub
1 x iCUE Commander Core XT
8 x XF Hardline 14mm OD Fitting - Black (2x Four pack)2 x 90° Rotary Adapter - Black (1x Twin pack)3m XT Hardline 14/10mm OD/ID Tubing (cut into 6x 0,5m length)
1 x XT Hardline Bending Toolkit
1 x Filling Bottle
1 x Set of "Hydro X" stickers
Label: Líquida CUSTOM Corsair Hydro XH305i
